org.mini2Dx.core

Interface TaskExecutor

  • All Superinterfaces:
    org.mini2Dx.gdx.utils.Disposable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    LibgdxTaskExecutor

    public interface TaskExecutor
extends org.mini2Dx.gdx.utils.Disposable
    Interface for platform-specific threading implementations

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Queues a Runnable instance to be run on a separate thread

      Sets the maximum number of FrameSpreadTask instances to update per frame

    • Method Detail

      • update

        void update(float delta)
        Updates FrameSpreadTask instances each frame. Note: This is called by mini2Dx and should not be called manually.
        Parameters:
        delta - The game delta time

      • execute

        void execute(java.lang.Runnable runnable)
        Queues a Runnable instance to be run on a separate thread
        Parameters:
        runnable - The task to run on a separate thread

      • submit

        AsyncFuture submit(java.lang.Runnable runnable)
        Submits a Runnable instance to be executed on a separate thread
        Parameters:
        runnable - The task to run on a separate thread
        Returns:
        A AsyncFuture instance that can be checked for task completion

      • submit

        <T> AsyncResult<T> submit(java.util.concurrent.Callable<T> callable)
        Submits a Callable instance to be executed on a separate thread
        Type Parameters:
        T - The return type
        Parameters:
        callable - The task to run on a separate thread
        Returns:
        A AsyncResult instance that can be checked for task completion

      • submit

        void submit(FrameSpreadTask task)
        Submits a FrameSpreadTask to be completed over several frames
        Parameters:
        task - The FrameSpreadTask to execute

      • setMaxFrameTasksPerFrame

        void setMaxFrameTasksPerFrame(int max)
        Sets the maximum number of FrameSpreadTask instances to update per frame
        Parameters:
        max - The maximum number greater than 0
